title: How does one start running Karsten Luckes KLTF Glyph Transformer from within FontLab 5.02 after installing it?
content: Can anyone please explain to me step by step how one starts running Karsten Lucke’s KLTF Glyph Transformer from within FontLab 5.02 after installing it. I did install it successfully and then tried in vain and for quite some time to find where it was in the FontLab menu.
author: sasapetrova
